L

layoutBoard() - Method in class controller_view.BoardPane
This method creates the canvas for the game and adds the game prompt and live score to the pane.
layoutLeaderboard() - Method in class controller_view.LeaderboardPane
This is a public method that layouts the components of the leaderboard within the pane.
layoutPane() - Method in class controller_view.LoginPane
This method creates the GridPane that houses the elements of the login menu.
layoutShop() - Method in class controller_view.ShopPane
This method sets the layout of the shop table within the pane
layoutStatsPane() - Method in class controller_view.StatsPane
This method lays out the StatsPane by creating a GridPane with numerous labels that describe the current User's memory game statistics.
LeaderboardPane - Class in controller_view
This class represents a leaderboard pane in a game application.
LeaderboardPane(AccountCollection) - Constructor for class controller_view.LeaderboardPane
This is a public method/constructor that constructs a new LeaderboardPane instance.
LoginPane - Class in controller_view
The LoginPane class is a BorderPane that displays the login menu on the memoryGUI.
LoginPane(Accounts, AccountCollection, memoryGUI) - Constructor for class controller_view.LoginPane
This method lays out the BorderPane with a login menu.
logout() - Method in class controller_view.LoginPane
This method logs out the current user.
